root: ^Andreas, these inscriptions are in ancient Greek.
^I'm a sucker for Greek culture. I decided to learn this language when my interest first began.
^It says: "Every riddle has a solution". Riddles? What riddles?
^I'm not sure, but I guess there are traps around here. Ancient people were good at trap making. See, it's dangerous here. You better not follow me any further.
^I'm not scared. Besides, the inscription on the other wall says: "Only two can pass the trials"! So you won't succeed without me! Let's go already.
